section.p: This clinical statement describes an interaction between a patient and clinician. Interactions may include in-person encounters, telephone conversations, and email exchanges.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8712, CONF:1198-26353, CONF:1198-32546 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Encounter Activities template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet EncounterTypeCode 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.32 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8714)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDischargeDispositionCode (CONF:1198-32176)
Note: The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the dischargeDispositionCode element.

SHOULD contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8738, CONF:1198-14903)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8722, CONF:1198-8723, CONF:1198-14899)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1198-8725)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-8726)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8727)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-15492, CONF:1198-15973)
Conforms to Encounter Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80:2015-08-01)

sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL contain exactly [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.33 NUBC UB-04 FL17-Patient Status (code system 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.5) DYNAMIC or, if access to NUBC is unavailable, from CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 HL7 Discharge Disposition. sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL contain exactly [1..1] @codeSystem, which SHALL be either CodeSystem: NUBC 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.5 OR CodeSystem: HL7 Discharge Disposition 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 (CONF:1198-32177, CONF:1198-32377)
SHALL conform to Encounter Activities template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8710, R2.1=CONF:1198-8710)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8711, R2.1=CONF:1198-8711)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8713, R2.1=CONF:1198-8713)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet EncounterTypeCode 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.32 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8714)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8715, R2.1=CONF:1198-8715)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDischargeDispositionCode (CONF:1198-32176)
Note: The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the dischargeDispositionCode element.

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8738, CONF:14903)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

SHOULD contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8738, CONF:1198-14903)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8722, CONF:1198-8723, CONF:1198-14899)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1198-8725)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-8726)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8727)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-15492, CONF:1198-15973)
Conforms to Encounter Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80:2015-08-01)
code, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8719, R2.1=CONF:1198-8719)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15970, R2.1=CONF:1198-15970)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15971, R2.1=CONF:1198-15971)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15972, R2.1=CONF:1198-15972)

EncounterActivities with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8740, R2.1=CONF:1198-8740)

sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.33 NUBC UB-04 FL17-Patient Status DYNAMIC or, if access to NUBC is unavailable, from CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 HL7 Discharge Disposition (CONF:9929)

sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL contain exactly [1..1] @code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.33 NUBC UB-04 FL17-Patient Status (code system 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.5) DYNAMIC or, if access to NUBC is unavailable, from CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 HL7 Discharge Disposition. sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL contain exactly [1..1] @codeSystem, which SHALL be either CodeSystem: NUBC 2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.5 OR CodeSystem: HL7 Discharge Disposition 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 (CONF:1198-32177, CONF:1198-32377)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8712, CONF:26353 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49"
Consol Encounter Activities code, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8719, R2.1=CONF:1198-8719)
Consol Encounter Activities originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15970, R2.1=CONF:1198-15970)
Consol Encounter Activities reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15971, R2.1=CONF:1198-15971)

Consol Encounter Activities reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15972, R2.1=CONF:1198-15972)

Consol Encounter Activities EncounterActivities with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8740, R2.1=CONF:1198-8740)

Consol Encounter Activities sdtc:dischargeDispositionCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.33 NUBC UB-04 FL17-Patient Status DYNAMIC or, if access to NUBC is unavailable, from CodeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.12.112 HL7 Discharge Disposition (CONF:9929)
SHALL conform to CDA Encounter
Consol Encounter Activities SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8710, R2.1=CONF:1198-8710)
Consol Encounter Activities SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8711, R2.1=CONF:1198-8711)
Consol Encounter Activities SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8713, R2.1=CONF:1198-8713)
Consol Encounter Activities SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet EncounterTypeCode 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.32 DYNAMIC (CONF:8714)
Consol Encounter Activities SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8715, R2.1=CONF:1198-8715)
Consol Encounter Activities MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8738, CONF:14903) Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

Consol Encounter Activities MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8722, CONF:8723, CONF:14899) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)
Consol Encounter Activities MAY contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Encounter Performer (CONF:8725)
Consol Encounter Activities MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:15492, CONF:15973) Conforms to Encounter Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80)
Consol Encounter Activities MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDischargeDispositionCode (CONF:9929)
SHALL conform to CDA Performer2
Consol Encounter Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Encounter Performer Assigned Entity (CONF:8726)
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Encounter Performer Assigned Entity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:8727)
